sentences.en: Abruptly the group ahead of us came to a standstill.
sentences.cn: 我们前面的小组突然停了下来。

sentences.en: He gestured abruptly for Virginia to get in the car.
sentences.cn: 他粗鲁地示意弗吉尼亚上车.

sentences.en: He stopped abruptly and looked my way.
sentences.cn: 他突然停下，朝我看过来。

sentences.en: Her next remark abruptly terminated the conversation.
sentences.cn: 她接下来说的话使谈话戛然而止。

sentences.en: Her voice, small and fluting, stopped abruptly.
sentences.cn: 她细小但却抑扬顿挫的声音戛然而止。
他的合同意外地终止了.

sentences.en: I was abruptly notified that a half - hour speech was expected of me.
sentences.cn: 我突然被通知要讲 半 个小时的话.

sentences.en: If these drugs are stopped abruptly then some withdrawal symptoms may occur.
sentences.cn: 如果突然停服这些药，则可能出现一些戒断症状。

sentences.en: Isabel rose so abruptly that she knocked down her chair.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔起得太急了，以致碰倒了她坐的椅子。

sentences.en: The advantage abruptly turned against them.
sentences.cn: 有利的条件突然变得对他们不利起来.

sentences.en: The ground falls away abruptly to the right.
Then abruptly he revved the engine to full power.
sentences.cn: 然后他突然加速到最大马力。
